class_b_08_math_01:
All right, everyone. It’s time to begin our final
exam.[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_08_math_02:
I’m sure the fun experiences you all had in my
class will serve you well as you answer![VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_08_question_01:
1. How many Great Balls could you purchase with
    3,000 if each one costs 600?

A) Five		B) Six
C) Seven
class_b_08_question_02:
2. If a Water-type move with a power of 100
    lands a critical hit on a Grass-type Pokémon,
    what will the move’s power be?

A) 50		B) 75
C) 100
class_b_08_question_03:
3. Under normal conditions, what percent chance
    does Stone Edge have to land a critical hit?

A) About 1 percent 	B) About 4 percent
C) About 12 percent
class_b_08_question_04:
4. If a Pokémon uses Swords Dance twice to
    boost its Attack by four stages, how much
    damage will its physical moves then do?

A) Double damage		B) Triple damage
C) Quadruple damage
class_b_08_question_05:
5. If a Rock-type Pokémon whose Tera Type is
    Rock Terastallizes, what will the power of its
    Rock-type moves be multiplied by?

A) 0.5			B) 1.5
C) 2
class_b_08_math_03:
All right, everyone. Time is up! Put your hands on
your laps, now.[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_08_math_04:
This test was the culmination of all I taught you,
and I’m sure you all did just fine.[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_08_math_05:
Do go and ask for your scores at the front desk
and then take a nice break.[VAR 0114(0025)]
